title: NBA Star Kevin Durant Launches $200 Million SPAC
sub_head: Brooklyn Nets player is latest sports and entertainment figure to back a blank-check company
body:
NBA star Kevin Durant aims to launch a $200 million blank-check company, making him the latest celebrity to get in on the SPAC craze.
The special-purpose acquisition company is Infinite Acquisition Corp., which plans to merge with a company in one or more of the following sectors: Sports, health, sustainable food technology and cryptocurrency. SPACs can take public companies that lie outside their intended sectors.
